version_description: - In iOS9, fixes bugs that can not show Japanese even if device language is Japanese.

▼Thank you for your support.
- Weather update performance adjustments.
- Widget adjustments.
- Minor bugs fixes.

▼ Thank you for your support.

- Optimized iPhone6, iPhone6Plus, iPhone6s, iPhone6sPlus.
- Support for portrait orientation in iPad.
- Support for iPad Pro.
- Directly launch the weather forecast view from Widget and a notification.
- Changed the menu in the weather forecast split view.
- Localized in Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean.
- Changed the menu color.
- Fixed minor bugs.

▼ Fine ° Rise (Paid App)
You can check daily forecast, sunrise time, sunset time, humidity, wind speed in Widget.

▼ Thank you for your support.

- Performance adjustments and bugs fixes.

▼ Thank you for your support.

- Performance adjustments and bugs fixes.

▼ Thank you for your support.

- Performance adjustments and bugs fixes.
- Adjustment of iPad layout.
- Adjustment of ads for the deprecated iAd.

▼ Thank you for your support.

- Performance adjustments and bugs fixes.

▼ Thank you for your support.
This update supports iOS 10.

▼ iOS 10
◆ Widget
- New design Widget.
- You can choose the background color of the widget from default and dark.
- Supports compact mode.
- If you use 3D Touch to firmly press the App icon, the Widget can be checked quickly.

◆ Notification
- Supports Rich Notifications.
- By using 3D Touch to firmly press the notification, details can be viewed through a beautiful animation.
- For devices without 3D Touch, details can be viewed by sliding the notification and pressing the View button.

◆ iMessage
- You can send the weather of your location by message.
- You can send still images and animation images.

▼ Introduction
- Show after new installation.
- It can be shown also from the settings of the App.

▼ Others
- Performance improvements.
- Fixed of minor bugs.

*On iOS 11, you can select "While Using the App" for permission of Location Services, however, please select "Always" for this App to get weather information of the current location in the background.
